sect1.title: Using PerfCake from a Maven project
sect1.para: In this section, you can find information on using PerfCake in your own Maven project in case you do not want to or you cannot contribute directly to PerfCake repository, or you just want to its API.

For inclusion into your project, you can search for PerfCake artifacts at . In the results click at the version number and you will see snippets for various build systems. For Mave and version 1.0 you just include the following XML piece into your project dependencies.
